page.content: Eastwood Festival the Eaglesham pre-school playgroup held a coffee morning,the Venture Scouts held a Disco,the Eaglesham Sunday School raised Â£437 from a sponsored walk and lastly the B.B (Boys Brigade)held Sports in the Orry (Common Green). { THE CONSERVATION VILLAGE} Eaglesham was the first conservation village in Scotland.
